prompt:

A:
completion: Student Information Form, OSYM Result Document, Copy of Identity Card, 2 biometric photos, Certificate of Residence or Statement, Military Certificate, Diploma

completion: You can check this website based on your location: https://www.khas.edu.tr/en/access-to-campus/

prompt:
Q: What does core program mean?

A:
completion: In the first year, courses on art, culture, science and philosophy are taken the same as everyone else. In the remaining semesters, you will take courses specific to your department

completion: Yes, it is different for who are in prep class or 1st year students

completion: No

completion: No, 20 hours in a week

prompt:
Q: How about double major and minor? When can I apply?

A:
completion: You can apply for double major and minor between 3rd and 6th semester. For double major, your GPA has to be minimum 2.75, for minor, your GPA has to be minimum 2.50

prompt:
Q: Does the high school diploma itself or its printout be required for registration?

A:
completion: You can give print-out version of your diplomai but you should show diploma itself as well

prompt:
Q: With whom registration can be made other than the mother and father, can the student register alone?

A:
completion: You can also register yourself. However, if you are going to pay the school on credit, you must have a guarantor with you during registration
